languages.text: Странствующий торговец, представившийся Паломником, передал Вольному Торговцу в благодарность за помощь древние имперские документы. Если верить свиткам, на неком "перепутье" Простора около двух веков назад сгинул целый имперский мир.

traits.locale_text: Странствующий торговец, представившийся Паломником, передал Вольному Торговцу в благодарность за помощь древние имперские документы. Если верить свиткам, на неком "перепутье" Коронуса около двух веков назад сгинул целый имперский мир.

languages.text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.
languages.original_text: Странствующий торговец, представившийся Паломником, передал Вольному Торговцу в благодарность за помощь древние имперские документы. Если верить свиткам, на неком "перепутье" Простора около двух веков назад сгинул целый имперский мир.

traits.locale_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Koronus, an entire Imperial world perished.

The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Koronus, an entire Imperial world perished.

The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Koronus, an entire Imperial world perished.

The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

languages.text: 一位自称“朝圣者”的流浪商人将古老的帝国文件交给了行商浪人，以示感谢。如果这些文件的内容都是真的，那么大约两个世纪之前，帝国的某个世界曾在科罗努斯扩区的某个“交叉点”处毁于一旦。
languages.original_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

traits.locale_text: 一位自称“朝圣者”的流浪商人将古老的帝国文件交给了行商浪人，以示感谢。如果这些文件的内容都是真的，那么大约两个世纪之前，帝国的某个世界曾在科罗努斯扩区的某个“交叉点”处毁于一旦。

languages.text: 巡礼者と名乗る放浪の商人は、感謝の印として自由開拓者に帝国の古代文書を与えた。この文書が信じられるとすれば、約2世紀前、エクスパンスのどこかの「交差点」で、インペリアルワールド全体が滅びたとのことだ。
languages.original_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

traits.locale_text: 巡礼者と名乗る放浪の商人は、感謝の印として自由開拓者に帝国の古代文書を与えた。この文書が信じられるとすれば、約2世紀前、エクスパンスのどこかの「交差点」で、インペリアルワールド全体が滅びたとのことだ。

languages.text: El mercader errante conocido como el Peregrino entregó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente una serie de documentos antiguos del Imperium como agradecimiento. Si lo que pone es cierto, hace unos dos siglos un mundo Imperial entero murió en un «cruce de caminos» de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

traits.locale_text: El mercader errante conocido como el Peregrino entregó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente una serie de documentos antiguos del Imperium como agradecimiento. Si lo que pone es cierto, hace unos dos siglos un mundo Imperial entero murió en un «cruce de caminos» de la Extensión.

languages.text: Der fahrende Händler, der sich selbst als Pilger bezeichnet, hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zum Dank einige alte imperiale Dokumente überlassen. Sofern man den Schriftrollen glauben kann, hat vor etwas zwei Jahrhunderten eine "Wegkreuzung" in der Ausdehnung zum Untergang einer imperialen Welt geführt.
languages.original_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

traits.locale_text: Der fahrende Händler, der sich selbst als Pilger bezeichnet, hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zum Dank einige alte imperiale Dokumente überlassen. Sofern man den Schriftrollen glauben kann, hat vor etwas zwei Jahrhunderten eine "Wegkreuzung" in der Ausdehnung zum Untergang einer imperialen Welt geführt.

languages.text: Le marchand ambulant qui se fait appeler le Pèlerin a donné {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'anciens documents impériaux en guise de remerciement. À en croire ces parchemins, il y a environ deux siècles, un monde impérial tout entier a péri près d'une « croisée » des Étendues.
languages.original_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

traits.locale_text: Le marchand ambulant qui se fait appeler le Pèlerin a donné {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} d'anciens documents impériaux en guise de remerciement. À en croire ces parchemins, il y a environ deux siècles, un monde impérial tout entier a péri près d'une « croisée » des Étendues.

languages.text: Kendisine Seyyah diyen gezgin tacir, Hür Tacir'e teşekkür babında kadim İmparatorluk dokümanları verdi. Parşömenlerde yazılanlar doğruysa yaklaşık iki yüzyıl önce, Enginlik'te "yolların kesiştiği bir yer"de bir İmparatorluk dünyası tamamen yok olmuş.
languages.original_text: The wandering trader calling himself the Pilgrim gave the Rogue Trader ancient Imperial documents as a token of thanks. If the scrolls are to be believed, around two centuries ago, at some "crossing of paths" in the Expanse, an entire Imperial world perished.

traits.locale_text: Kendisine Seyyah diyen gezgin tacir, Hür Tacir'e teşekkür babında kadim İmparatorluk dokümanları verdi. Parşömenlerde yazılanlar doğruysa yaklaşık iki yüzyıl önce, Enginlik'te "yolların kesiştiği bir yer"de, bir İmparatorluk dünyası tamamen yok olmuş.
